Options:

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the production of the movie 'In the Name of the King' released in 2008?
Options:
A. The movie was filmed near the Municipality of Sooke.
B. The production took place entirely in a studio.
C. The filming location included natural landscapes around Sooke.
D. The movie was produced in the year 2008.
Answer: The movie was filmed near the Municipality of Sooke., The filming location included natural landscapes around Sooke., The movie was produced in the year 2008.
